heroContent.heading: Explore your hobby or passion
heroContent.content: Sign-in to interact with a community of fellow hobbyists and an eco-system of experts, teachers, suppliers, classes, workshops, and places to practice, participate or perform. Your hobby may be about visual or performing arts, sports, games, gardening, model making, cooking, indoor or outdoor activitiesâ€¦
heroContent.subContent: If you are an expert or a seller, you can Add your Listing and promote yourself, your students, products, services or events. Hop on your hobbyhorse and enjoy the ride.

form.tctext: By continuing, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.

cards.cardDescription: Find a teacher, coach, or expert for your hobby interest in your locality.  Find a partner, teammate, accompanist or collaborator.
Find a class, school, playground, auditorium, studio, shop or an event venue.  Book a slot at venues that allow booking through hobbycue.
Find equipment or supplies required for your hobby.  Buy, rent or borrow from shops, online stores or from community members.
Find events, meetups and workshops related to your hobby.  Register or buy tickets online.

addOwn.cardDescription: Are you a teacher or expert?  Do you sell or rent out equipment, venue or event tickets?  Or, you know someone who should be on hobbycue?  Go ahead and Add your Own page
